summary: AN ORDINANCE carrying over and transferring the unexpended and unencumbered balances in certain 1975 Budget appropriations made from the General, Library, Seattle Center, City Street, Light, Water, Sewer, Engineering Department Operating, Building Department Operating, General Services Operating, Personnel Services Operating, Human Resources Operating, Urban Renewal Operating, Community Development Operating, Arts Commission Operating, Employees' Retirement, Firemen's Leave and Disability, and Model City Funds to the respective items in the 1976 Budget.
